media.description:
A little girl reflects on her last summer with her father at his funeral.

Set on a small island in Japan where the director was born and raised, the film explores the relationship between the death of her father and the bomb storage in the mountain behind the family house.

The die is cast.

Music video animated by Riri Yamashita for the song Kamisama no Idenshi by Mafumafu.
Music video animated by Ai Niina for the song nag by Centimillimental.

The third season of Doggie Corgi.

Note: While the first 2 seasons were released as "looping animations", the third season is releasing as a regular short series.

I’m the only one who can't live without an oxygen tank in the underwater world. No matter how suffocated I feel, I preserve peace and harmony by pretending the selfish girl and my friends with complicated family backgrounds don’t bother me.

Graduate Work 2021, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

How long has it been since she lost control of her body? She is completely tapped out and finds herself wishing that she could just shed her body.

Graduate Work 2019, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)
Graduation work of Keiko Fujimi at Tama Art University.
Graduation work of Ryota Yuno at Tama Art University.
Graduation work of Tomoka Hiroshige at Tama Art University.
Graduation work of Nao Tsukahara at Tama Art University.
Miho Takahashi's graduation work from 2021 at Tama Art University.

Animated music video directed by Tokichiaki for the song Nani Yattemo Umaku Ikanai by meiyo.

Note: There are currently two versions of this music video, one released on September 26 featuring vocals meiyo and another one featuring vocals by Kafu released on October 3.
Light-hearted chibi-style episodes of Shiguang Dailiren about the daily life in the photo studio.

To commemorate the first release of the DENONBU Shibuya series of web novels, a short animation directed by Daiki Inaba was made that takes a glimpse at Karin's first encounter with her fellow club members Lucia and Mitsuki from the Shibuya district.

Malice comes up abruptly. As if it is blinking. Capricious like a flapping insect. One day a young hermit finds a winged insect and crushes it out of disgust. Meanwhile, the elephant sees the whole situation but says nothing. From that day on, the boy is chased by shadows of the winged insects.

New anime shorts posted on Keiichi Arawi's YouTube channel about the titular Amemiya-san.

The list of released videos included in this entry are as follows:
1) 【アニメ】丑三つ時の雨宮さん (Mar 9, 2021).
2) 【アニメ】新学期の雨宮さん (Apr 27, 2021).
3) 【アニメ】雨宮さんとドクロのうた (Aug 27, 2021).

A world from which Honkai has disappeared. A journey towards the heavens. The first test flight is about to begin.

(Source: Youtube Description)
Short films made with RiBLA Studio, the VR tool that lets anybody make their own anime.
Music video directed by ShiShi Yamazaki for the song Peace by FreeTEMPO.
Music video directed and animated by Ryuu Katou for the song Tsuki ni Hoeru by Yorushika.
Sawako Kabuki's contribution to the event "Atarashii Yoru no Hanabi", where fireworks-themed short films by four artists were screened on the wall of the BONUS TRACK plaza.
Choi Seo-Yeon's graduation work from 2020 at Tama Art University.
Hamaguchi Taigo's graduation work from 2020 at Tama Art University.
Music video for the song Chiisaki Monotachi by MAN WITH A MISSION that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program.
Music video directed by Tatsuro Ogata for the original song Uranomito by Tsukino Mito.
The fifth season of Yao Shen Ji.

Music video directed by Sunao for the song Yakou wo Yobu by KOKO.

Note: The music video initially premiered on KOKO's YouTube channel on September 25, 2021, but was reuploaded again on September 28, with corrected credits.
In a small Korean town, two 18-year-old girls, Suyi and Yi-gyeong, fall in love, dreaming of moving to Seoul together after graduation.
A music video for the song Hibi by AiNA THE END.
Music video directed by Ryouji Yamada for the song Juuku-Gatsu by RIM.
Special to celebrate the ninth season of Yami Shibai.
Remake of season 1 of the originally fan-made animation based on World of Warcraft.
The fourth season of Fatchi Baike.

In Yongning Village at the foot of Chicheng Mountain, mischievous young Li Xiuyuan wants to become a hero. Unfortunately though, his various attempts to help his sick mother and prove himself to the villagers only seem to backfire. One day, following a perilous encounter, Xiuyuan learns that he is in fact the reincarnation of the great hero Dragon Slaying Luohan. He also discovers that his father once protected him by stealing a sacred golden artefact for the evil Jin Ling. As his powers begin to awaken, Xiuyuan finally knows what he has to do to become a true hero.
The sixth season of Ashuai.
Unaired episode 13 included with the Blu-ray release of Getsuyoubi no Tawawa 2.
An unaired episode included with the Ganbare, Douki-chan Blu-ray.

title.userPreferred: Ruguo Lishi Shi Yi Qun Miao 7

media.description: The seventh season of Ruguo Lishi Shi Yi Qun Miao.
The second half of Moshi Juexing: Suyuan.

Episodes:
Chapter One (第一章), November 13, 2021.
Chapter Two (第二章), December 11, 2021.
Chapter Three (第三章), January 29, 2022.

Note: The episodes will be streamed in advance on the U-NEXT service ahead of the official BD/DVD release. These OVAs will have a Blu-Ray/DVD release on December 24, 2021, January 28, 2022, and February 25, 2022 respectively.
Commercial for Aaliyah's self-titled album.
The second season of Shouji Li de Huanxiong Xiaozhen.
The third season of Meichuxi De Yinyangshi Yijia.
The second season of Meng Qi Shi Shen.
